meanings.definition: A sound made by a mobile phone to signal an incoming call.
meanings.sent1: My phone's ringtones are always so loud!
meanings.sent2: I changed my ringtones to a catchy tune.
meanings.sent3: The ringtones on my phone make me jump every time!
meanings.sent4: Her ringtones were like musical notes dancing in the air.
meanings.sent5: The ringtones echoed through the room, breaking the silence.

meanings.definition: A customizable sound used to alert the user of an incoming call or message.
meanings.sent1: I love setting different ringtones for my friends.
meanings.sent2: His unique ringtones always make me smile.
meanings.sent3: The funny ringtones on my phone never fail to make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her ringtones were like a symphony of personalized melodies.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant ringtones added color to his mundane day.
